title: [Dynamic Region]tikv panic for "assertion failed: !state.has_merge_state()"
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
[2023/07/30 04:15:22.889 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:93] ["Git Commit Hash: https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/42882f8bcf4ce52ea93f93d325c000147ac2e137"]

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
jepsen-monotonic-pessimistic test
"Establishes a collection of integers identified by keys. Monotonically
increments individual keys via read-write transactions, and reads keys in
small groups. We verify that the order of transactions implied by each key
are mutually consistent; e.g. no transaction can observe key x increase, but
key y decrease."
### What did you expect?
test case run normally
### What did happened?
```
[2023/07/30 10:14:41.401 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:510] ["assertion failed: !state.has_merge_state()"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
```

comments_data.body: Probably the same root cause as #15242, waiting for #15243
Should be fixed by now. Reopen if otherwise.
